City Council

peopleView Meetings

Meeting Schedule:

City Council meetings are held at 6:00 pm on the second Monday of each month at the Troy Community Center located at 201 East Main Street. All meetings are open to the public.

Members:

 Board Member
 Title
Laurie BaileyMayor Pro-Tem
Brett HansonCouncilmember
James HicksCouncilmember
Paul RamirezCouncilmember
Leland BoykinCouncilmember
